title: Letter: You wonder how bankers find time for presentations
text:
The presentation from Goldman Sachs analysts (Report, March 18) to management complaining of 95-hour weeks on client work is indeed troubling: how did they find the time to produce it?

Roderick Wallace
London BR3, UK
